# Overview {-#overview}

```{r, echo=FALSE, out.width="100%",fig.align = 'center'}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here("img/cdl-lab-banner.jpg"))
```

This document acts as a comprehensive reference material for members of the Conservation Decisions Lab. This document should be reviewed in its entirety when you first join the lab and from then on used as a first point of reference for any questions that might come up during your time with the lab.
